cs.DB, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.IR, cs.SE. 

This paper deals with the problem of fragmentation in highly distributed databases, which is a core issue in the field of database systems (cs.DB). The proposed approach aims to minimize distributed transactions, which is a key concern in distributed computing (cs.DC) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also mentions workload-awareness and system throughput, which are relevant topics in information retrieval (cs.IR) and software engineering (cs.SE).
